channel.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
channel.description:
Topic says it all.
How do I make an NPC talk on ExRedum source?
What do I search for in NPChandler, and what do I put in there?

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Then whats the code to make it talk above its head?

Read full topic
item.source: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:6, topic:297103”][quote author=SandScape link=topic=393123.msg2926076#msg2926076 date=1251006298]
that number 409 down there is the npc
id put the id of the npc you want to talk.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "This is what the npc will say"; }

btw you dont search for anything.you have to add this command to your npchandler.java
[/quote]
You’ll need a Interface for it to Open.

or you can do it Allstar style:
sayText(“Im a Natural Retart)”

that first bit is either “sayText” “sM” “sendMessage” who knows, allstar is history[/quote]wrong you dont need a interface for npcs to talk

Read full topic
item.source: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @system system

@system wrote:

I dont want an interface to open, I want it to say it above its head.

So how do I do that

item.source: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:2, topic:297103”]that number 409 down there is the npc
id put the id of the npc you want to talk.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "This is what the npc will say"; }

btw you dont search for anything.you have to add this command to your npchandler.java[/quote]
You’ll need a Interface for it to Open.

or you can do it Allstar style:
sayText(“Im a Natural Retart)”

that first bit is either “sayText” “sM” “sendMessage” who knows, allstar is history

Read full topic

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay lemme try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 11:49:20 pm[/size][hr]Okay, I got an error.

NPCHandler.java:3159: class, interface, or enum expected
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3322) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3162: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:3163: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to edge pk”;
^
NPCHandler.java:3164: class, interface, or enum expected
}→
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]

item.title: [ExRedum] How do I make NPCS talk? ABOVE ITS HEAD [HELP PLEASE REP+ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

that number 409 down there is the npc
id put the id of the npc you want to talk.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "This is what the npc will say"; }

btw you dont search for anything.you have to add this command to your npchandler.java

Read full topic
